plot: Wyatt Earp III is the owner of a small carnival which travels from town to town. Various adventures and misadventures occur along the way.
plot_en: Wyatt Earp III is the owner of a small carnival which travels from town to town. Various adventures and misadventures occur along the way.
plot_es: Wyatt Earp III is the owner of a small carnival which travels from town to town. Various adventures and misadventures occur along the way.
title: The Rousters
